item.title: Lecture 07 - Geodatabases
item.description: Meta Key Topics ArcCatalog Geodatabases R readr sf Writing Data Resources Open on LP-07 Re-writing Shapefiles in R Some of you may have been confronted with an error in the lecture prep when you went to knitr your notebook after testing all of its code: By default, the st_write() function will not overwrite an existing shapefile. You can alter this behavior by re-structuring the function to add the delete_dsn option:
